an5.120:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing five qualities, a bhikkhun朝 is deposited in hell as if brought there. What five? () Without investigating and scrutinizing, she speaks praise of one who deserves dispraise. (2) Without investigating and scrutinizing, she speaks dispraise of one who deserves praise. (3) She is of wrong effort (4) and has wrong mindfulness. (5) She squanders gifts given out of faith. Possessing these five qualities, a bhikkhun朝 is deposited in hell as if brought there.
an5.120:2: "Bhikkhus, possessing fiveotherqualities, a bhikkhun朝 is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What five? (1) Having investigated and scrutinized, she speaks dispraise of one who deserves dispraise. () Having investigated and scrutinized, she speaks praise of one who deserves praise. (3) She is of right effort (4) and has right mindfulness. (5) She does not squander gifts given out of faith. Possessing these five qualities, a bhikkhun朝 is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
